name: Next Day Delivery!!
description:
Keyboard Controls (recommended!):

  • Move - Left/Right Arrow Keys
  • Crouch - Down Arrow Key
  • Jump - Spacebar
  • Run - Z
  • Stomp (in mid-air) - X
  • Reset - R

Xbox Controller also supported!

  • Move- Left Stick
  • Crouch - Left Trigger
  • Jump - A
  • Run - Right Trigger
  • Stomp - X
  • Reset - Y

Tips:

  • Jump as soon as you land to begin triple jumping, leads to a big boost on the third jump
  • Hold crouch for a little bit and then jump, you'll do a high backflip jump
  • Press crouch whilst moving to slide, then press jump whilst sliding to do a long jump
  • Hold against a wall to wall cling, then press jump to wall jump away from it
